services.name: Alterations
services.description: Professional alteration services to ensure your garments fit perfectly. We handle hemming, taking in or letting out seams, adjusting sleeves, and more to make your clothes look tailor-made for you.

services.name: Dress
services.description: Custom dressmaking services. From elegant evening wear to casual day dresses, we create beautiful, well-fitted garments tailored to your style and measurements.
